title: Adguard for Mac (v1.0) [Mac OS X] [ENG/RUS] (2015)
description:
Program name: Adguard
Program Type: Anti-Banner, a program for ad-blocking
Version: 1.0
Release date: April 29, 2015
Language: English, Russian
Operating system: OS X
File size: 24 Mb
----------------------------------------------------
Description
Adguard - is one of a kind of full ad blocker for Mac OS X. It is a universal program that contains all the necessary options for the most comfortable using the Internet. Ad Blockers, warning or blocking phishing and other online threats and protection of your personal data on the Internet.

Adguard able to block advertising absolutely in any application. In contradistinction to other existing solutions for Internet filtering, Adguard was created specifically for the Mac, which allows you to block advertising are not only in browsers, but also in the applications installed on your device.
----------------------------------------------------
Advantages of the program:
1. Works in all popular browsers;
2. Designed to block all types of advertising;
3. Easy to use, blocks ads insensibly in the background mode;
4. Warns about the danger during the transition to suspicious websites;
5. Has the module (Assistant Adguard) to manage the program directly from your browser;
6. Prevents from counters and systems analysts, prohibits tracking user activity online.
----------------------------------------------------
System requirements:
Operating System: OS X 10.7 and beyond
Browsers: Any (Safari, Google Chrome, Opera & Opera Next etc.)
Disk: 100 MB free hard disk space
